task.title: Open Query Script
task.shortdesc: Open a previously saved query so that you can edit or re-run it.

step.cmd: Select the QueryScript Editor... menu item.
step.stepresult: This will open the Query Project window.This window is also accessible by opening any query type in the Query menu.

step.cmd: Click the Open script button above the currently visible form/script.
Locate and select the script file that you wish to open and click Open.
Edit and/or run the query script as desired. To save changes to the script, click Save script above the form/script.
